snippet: Dr. Kermit Gosnell, known for performing late-term abortions, was convicted on three counts of first-degree murder over his actions at his West Philadelphia clinic.
abstract: Dr Kermit Gosnell, known for performing late-term abortions at his West Philadelphia clinic, is convicted of three counts of first-degree murder in case that became rallying cry for anti-abortion activists.

byline.original: By JON HURDLE and TRIP GABRIEL
byline.contributor: Jon Hurdle reported from Philadelphia, and Trip Gabriel from New York.

lead_paragraph: Dr. Kermit Gosnell, known for performing late-term abortions, was convicted on three counts of first-degree murder over his actions at his West Philadelphia clinic.

headline.seo: Kermit Gosnell, Abortion Doctor, Found Guilty of Murder
headline.main: Philadelphia Abortion Doctor Guilty of Murder in Late-Term Procedures
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Abortion Doctor Guilty of Murder in Late-Term Procedures
